DOC.brief_summary: This large , community-based , cluster-randomized trial compare routine prophylactic use 600 mcg oral misoprostol 10 IU oxytocin deliver UnijectTM intramuscularly third stage labor
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Misoprostol Oxytocin Uniject Postpartum Hemorrhage ( PPH ) Prevention Senegal
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess programmatic implication ( include feasibility , acceptability , risk benefit ) community level introduction misoprostol and/or oxytocin UnijectTM prevention PPH help identify appropriate niche drug .
DOC.criteria: woman deliver community health center ( case de sante ) train study provider ( matrone ) able provide inform consent woman know contraindication prostaglandin
